reviews.review: Spectacular! Loved almost every second. The only part that I questioned was Peter Dinklage's character (wasn't a fan of the voice he was using)

Best marvel movie ever
Tons of characters but every one is treated perfectly to make the best much movie for now 
Unreal ending many people were expecting but none thought marvel would make, it is a shocking movie but a majestic marvel movie

After years of build up Marvel Studios could have fumbled the ball pretty easily with any number of slip ups but they stuck the landing and made what was easily the best superhero/comic book movie of 2018. I absolutely loved the film. Unlike a number of Marvel movies in the past they didn't overdue the comic moments. In all honesty some of the jokes in this movie were some of the best parts of the movie, namely the Drax character, if you've seen the film you know the scenes I'm writing about, pure gold in my opinion. Tons of great action, many great heroic moments for the likes of Cap, Thor, and many others. The movie made the stakes seem high and built tension well. The Russo Brothers have made some of the best MCU films, including the best of them all Captain America: Winter Soldier, as well as a film that with every repeated viewing grows on me more and more in Captain America: Civil War. Watching this makes me wish even more that Warner Bros had taken their time a little more and built up JL and of course Darkseid. The ten years of build up, starting from the first Ironman film in 2008 til this movie was well worth the wait. An outstanding comic book movie.
Amazing movie... Is movie the best of all superhero movie

This is the movie that ultimately made my dig extremely deep into the Marvel Universe for the first time. My first reaction of it was absolute disappointment followed by extreme cravings on finding out what would happen next. Well, to be honest, I nearly cried in the end of the movie. This made buy more Marvel Comics that I think I first could've even afford. I realized after a short while that this movie, due to my reaction, is the most brilliant I've seen for a long while.
Most epic movie of the decade. Incredible effects and story. Must watch all the pre-quels to fully appreciate. Do not need to read any comics to enjoy.

Absolutely fantastic. The MCU is an anomaly in its films and unprecedented success and deserves the praise of all critics. Either way, even if you disliked it, Kevin Feige and Marvel could care less because they are too busy counting the 2 BILLION dollars they made worldwide.

Really good movie... actually for me it was the most enjoyable movie of the year. It was soooo anticipated and alot, trust me ALOT of people that i knew looked forward to it, including me. And it over exceeded my expectations... so its a strong 5/5 for me:)
